## lib-ethers package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledKumoStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledkumostore.md) | Ethers-based [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block. |
|  [EthersKumo](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.md) | Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object. |
|  [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) | Thrown when a transaction is cancelled or replaced by a different transaction. |
|  [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) | Thrown by [EthersKumo](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.md) in case of transaction failure. |
|  [PopulatableEthersKumo](./lib-ethers.populatableetherskumo.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [PopulatableKumo](./lib-base.populatablekumo.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [PopulatedEthersKumoTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedetherskumotransaction.md) | A transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [PopulatedEthersRedemption](./lib-ethers.populatedethersredemption.md) | A redemption transaction that has been prepared for sending. |
|  [ReadableEthersKumo](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumo.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [ReadableKumo](./lib-base.readablekumo.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SendableEthersKumo](./lib-ethers.sendableetherskumo.md) | Ethers-based implementation of [SendableKumo](./lib-base.sendablekumo.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [SentEthersKumoTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentetherskumotransaction.md) | A transaction that has already been sent. |
|  [UnsupportedNetworkError](./lib-ethers.unsupportednetworkerror.md) | Thrown when trying to connect to a network where Kumo is not deployed. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BlockPolledKumoStoreExtraState](./lib-ethers.blockpolledkumostoreextrastate.md) | Extra state added to [KumoStoreState](./lib-base.kumostorestate.md) by [BlockPolledKumoStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledkumostore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [BorrowingOperationOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of a transaction that borrows KUSD. |
|  [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [ReadableEthersKumo](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumo.md) functions. |
|  [EthersKumoConnection](./lib-ethers.etherskumoconnection.md) | Information about a connection to the Kumo protocol. |
|  [EthersKumoConnectionOptionalParams](./lib-ethers.etherskumoconnectionoptionalparams.md) | Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersKumo.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumo.connect_1.md) and [EthersKumo.connect()](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.connect_1.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersKumoWithStore](./lib-ethers.etherskumowithstore.md) | Variant of [EthersKumo](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.md) that exposes a [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) | Optional parameters taken by [EthersKumo](./lib-ethers.etherskumo.md) transaction functions. |
|  [ReadableEthersKumoWithStore](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumowithstore.md) | Variant of [ReadableEthersKumo](./lib-ethers.readableetherskumo.md) that exposes a [KumoStore](./lib-base.kumostore.md)<!-- -->. |
